body:
I am using raypcalls library, and i was wondering if there is any way to 
stop the calculation without waiting to the rays in the queue to finish 
and discard (ray_pdone), i mean, there are sometimes that you have high 
rendering parameters and the first few rays are very slow, so i would 
like  to "kill"  the processes or something similar ...
___
